bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Hotingers were Rockbridge County farmers and owners of Mountain View Farm, which is represented on the National Register of Historic Places.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This accounting ledger contains records of the Hotingers' Mountain View Farm in Rockbridge County, Virginia.
